domains.description:
This domain exposes DOM read/write operations. Each DOM Node is represented with its mirror object that has an `id`. This `id` can be used to get additional information on the Node, resolve it into the JavaScript object wrapper, etc. It is important that client receives DOM events only for the nodes that are known to the client. Backend keeps track of the nodes that were sent to the client and never sends the same node twice. It is client's responsibility to collect information about the nodes that were sent to the client.

Note that `iframe` owner elements will return corresponding document elements as their child nodes.

types.description:
Unique DOM node identifier used to reference a node that may not have been pushed to the
front-end.
Backend node with a friendly name.

DOM interaction is implemented in terms of mirror objects that represent the actual DOM nodes.
DOMNode is a base node mirror type.

properties.name: nodeId
properties.description:
Node identifier that is passed into the rest of the DOM messages as the `nodeId`. Backend
will only push node with given `id` once. It is aware of all requested nodes and will only
fire DOM events for nodes known to the client.

properties.name: parentId
properties.description: The id of the parent node if any.

properties.name: children
properties.description: Child nodes of this node when requested with children.

properties.name: attributes
properties.description: Attributes of the `Element` node in the form of flat array `[name1, value1, name2, value2]`.

properties.name: documentURL
properties.description: Document URL that `Document` or `FrameOwner` node points to.

properties.name: baseURL
properties.description: Base URL that `Document` or `FrameOwner` node uses for URL completion.

properties.name: xmlVersion
properties.description: `Document`'s XML version in case of XML documents.

properties.name: pseudoType
properties.description: Pseudo element type for this node.

properties.name: frameId
properties.description: Frame ID for frame owner elements.

properties.name: contentDocument
properties.description: Content document for frame owner elements.

properties.name: shadowRoots
properties.description: Shadow root list for given element host.

properties.name: templateContent
properties.description: Content document fragment for template elements.

properties.name: pseudoElements
properties.description: Pseudo elements associated with this node.

properties.name: importedDocument
properties.description: Import document for the HTMLImport links.

properties.name: distributedNodes
properties.description: Distributed nodes for given insertion point.

types.description: A structure holding an RGBA color.

properties.name: r
properties.description: The red component, in the [0-255] range.

properties.name: g
properties.description: The green component, in the [0-255] range.

properties.name: b
properties.description: The blue component, in the [0-255] range.

properties.name: a
properties.description: The alpha component, in the [0-1] range (default: 1).

types.description: An array of quad vertices, x immediately followed by y for each point, points clock-wise.

commands.name: collectClassNamesFromSubtree
commands.description: Collects class names for the node with given id and all of it's child nodes.

parameters.name: nodeId
parameters.description: Id of the node to collect class names.

commands.name: copyTo
commands.description:
Creates a deep copy of the specified node and places it into the target container before the
given anchor.

parameters.name: nodeId
parameters.description: Id of the node to copy.

parameters.name: targetNodeId
parameters.description: Id of the element to drop the copy into.

parameters.name: insertBeforeNodeId
parameters.description:
Drop the copy before this node (if absent, the copy becomes the last child of
`targetNodeId`).

commands.name: describeNode
commands.description:
Describes node given its id, does not require domain to be enabled. Does not start tracking any
objects, can be used for automation.

parameters.name: nodeId
parameters.description: Identifier of the node.

parameters.name: backendNodeId
parameters.description: Identifier of the backend node.

parameters.name: objectId
parameters.description: JavaScript object id of the node wrapper.

parameters.name: depth
parameters.description:
The maximum depth at which children should be retrieved, defaults to 1. Use -1 for the
entire subtree or provide an integer larger than 0.

parameters.name: pierce
parameters.description:
Whether or not iframes and shadow roots should be traversed when returning the subtree
(default is false).

commands.name: disable
commands.description: Disables DOM agent for the given page.

commands.name: discardSearchResults
commands.description:
Discards search results from the session with the given id. `getSearchResults` should no longer
be called for that search.

parameters.name: searchId
parameters.description: Unique search session identifier.

commands.name: enable
commands.description: Enables DOM agent for the given page.

commands.name: focus
commands.description: Focuses the given element.

parameters.name: nodeId
parameters.description: Identifier of the node.

parameters.name: backendNodeId
parameters.description: Identifier of the backend node.

parameters.name: objectId
parameters.description: JavaScript object id of the node wrapper.

commands.name: getAttributes
commands.description: Returns attributes for the specified node.

parameters.name: nodeId
parameters.description: Id of the node to retrieve attibutes for.

returns.name: attributes
returns.description: An interleaved array of node attribute names and values.

commands.name: getBoxModel
commands.description: Returns boxes for the given node.

parameters.name: nodeId
parameters.description: Identifier of the node.

parameters.name: backendNodeId
parameters.description: Identifier of the backend node.

parameters.name: objectId
parameters.description: JavaScript object id of the node wrapper.

commands.name: getContentQuads
commands.description:
Returns quads that describe node position on the page. This method
might return multiple quads for inline nodes.

parameters.name: nodeId
parameters.description: Identifier of the node.

parameters.name: backendNodeId
parameters.description: Identifier of the backend node.

parameters.name: objectId
parameters.description: JavaScript object id of the node wrapper.

returns.name: quads
returns.description: Quads that describe node layout relative to viewport.

commands.name: getDocument
commands.description: Returns the root DOM node (and optionally the subtree) to the caller.

parameters.name: depth
parameters.description:
The maximum depth at which children should be retrieved, defaults to 1. Use -1 for the
entire subtree or provide an integer larger than 0.

parameters.name: pierce
parameters.description:
Whether or not iframes and shadow roots should be traversed when returning the subtree
(default is false).

commands.name: getFlattenedDocument
commands.description: Returns the root DOM node (and optionally the subtree) to the caller.

parameters.name: depth
parameters.description:
The maximum depth at which children should be retrieved, defaults to 1. Use -1 for the
entire subtree or provide an integer larger than 0.

parameters.name: pierce
parameters.description:
Whether or not iframes and shadow roots should be traversed when returning the subtree
(default is false).

commands.name: getNodeForLocation
commands.description:
Returns node id at given location. Depending on whether DOM domain is enabled, nodeId is
either returned or not.

parameters.name: x
parameters.description: X coordinate.

parameters.name: y
parameters.description: Y coordinate.

parameters.name: includeUserAgentShadowDOM
parameters.description: False to skip to the nearest non-UA shadow root ancestor (default: false).

returns.name: nodeId
returns.description: Id of the node at given coordinates, only when enabled and requested document.

commands.name: getOuterHTML
commands.description: Returns node's HTML markup.

parameters.name: nodeId
parameters.description: Identifier of the node.

parameters.name: backendNodeId
parameters.description: Identifier of the backend node.

parameters.name: objectId
parameters.description: JavaScript object id of the node wrapper.

commands.name: getRelayoutBoundary
commands.description: Returns the id of the nearest ancestor that is a relayout boundary.

parameters.name: nodeId
parameters.description: Id of the node.

returns.name: nodeId
returns.description: Relayout boundary node id for the given node.

commands.name: getSearchResults
commands.description:
Returns search results from given `fromIndex` to given `toIndex` from the search with the given
identifier.

parameters.name: searchId
parameters.description: Unique search session identifier.

parameters.name: fromIndex
parameters.description: Start index of the search result to be returned.

parameters.name: toIndex
parameters.description: End index of the search result to be returned.

returns.name: nodeIds
returns.description: Ids of the search result nodes.

commands.name: hideHighlight
commands.description: Hides any highlight.

commands.name: highlightNode
commands.description: Highlights DOM node.

commands.name: highlightRect
commands.description: Highlights given rectangle.

commands.name: markUndoableState
commands.description: Marks last undoable state.

commands.name: moveTo
commands.description: Moves node into the new container, places it before the given anchor.

parameters.name: nodeId
parameters.description: Id of the node to move.

parameters.name: targetNodeId
parameters.description: Id of the element to drop the moved node into.

parameters.name: insertBeforeNodeId
parameters.description:
Drop node before this one (if absent, the moved node becomes the last child of
`targetNodeId`).

returns.name: nodeId
returns.description: New id of the moved node.

commands.name: performSearch
commands.description:
Searches for a given string in the DOM tree. Use `getSearchResults` to access search results or
`cancelSearch` to end this search session.

parameters.name: query
parameters.description: Plain text or query selector or XPath search query.

parameters.name: includeUserAgentShadowDOM
parameters.description: True to search in user agent shadow DOM.

commands.name: pushNodeByPathToFrontend
commands.description: Requests that the node is sent to the caller given its path. // FIXME, use XPath

parameters.name: path
parameters.description: Path to node in the proprietary format.

returns.name: nodeId
returns.description: Id of the node for given path.

commands.name: pushNodesByBackendIdsToFrontend
commands.description: Requests that a batch of nodes is sent to the caller given their backend node ids.

parameters.name: backendNodeIds
parameters.description: The array of backend node ids.

returns.name: nodeIds
returns.description:
The array of ids of pushed nodes that correspond to the backend ids specified in
backendNodeIds.

commands.name: querySelector
commands.description: Executes `querySelector` on a given node.

parameters.name: nodeId
parameters.description: Id of the node to query upon.

parameters.name: selector
parameters.description: Selector string.

commands.name: querySelectorAll
commands.description: Executes `querySelectorAll` on a given node.

parameters.name: nodeId
parameters.description: Id of the node to query upon.

parameters.name: selector
parameters.description: Selector string.

commands.name: redo
commands.description: Re-does the last undone action.

commands.name: removeAttribute
commands.description: Removes attribute with given name from an element with given id.

parameters.name: nodeId
parameters.description: Id of the element to remove attribute from.

parameters.name: name
parameters.description: Name of the attribute to remove.

commands.name: removeNode
commands.description: Removes node with given id.

parameters.name: nodeId
parameters.description: Id of the node to remove.

commands.name: requestChildNodes
commands.description:
Requests that children of the node with given id are returned to the caller in form of
`setChildNodes` events where not only immediate children are retrieved, but all children down to
the specified depth.

parameters.name: nodeId
parameters.description: Id of the node to get children for.

parameters.name: depth
parameters.description:
The maximum depth at which children should be retrieved, defaults to 1. Use -1 for the
entire subtree or provide an integer larger than 0.

parameters.name: pierce
parameters.description:
Whether or not iframes and shadow roots should be traversed when returning the sub-tree
(default is false).

commands.name: requestNode
commands.description:
Requests that the node is sent to the caller given the JavaScript node object reference. All
nodes that form the path from the node to the root are also sent to the client as a series of
`setChildNodes` notifications.

parameters.name: objectId
parameters.description: JavaScript object id to convert into node.

commands.name: resolveNode
commands.description: Resolves the JavaScript node object for a given NodeId or BackendNodeId.

parameters.name: nodeId
parameters.description: Id of the node to resolve.

parameters.name: backendNodeId
parameters.description: Backend identifier of the node to resolve.

parameters.name: objectGroup
parameters.description: Symbolic group name that can be used to release multiple objects.

parameters.name: executionContextId
parameters.description: Execution context in which to resolve the node.

returns.name: object
returns.description: JavaScript object wrapper for given node.

commands.name: setAttributeValue
commands.description: Sets attribute for an element with given id.

parameters.name: nodeId
parameters.description: Id of the element to set attribute for.

parameters.name: name
parameters.description: Attribute name.

parameters.name: value
parameters.description: Attribute value.

commands.name: setAttributesAsText
commands.description:
Sets attributes on element with given id. This method is useful when user edits some existing
attribute value and types in several attribute name/value pairs.

parameters.name: nodeId
parameters.description: Id of the element to set attributes for.

parameters.name: text
parameters.description: Text with a number of attributes. Will parse this text using HTML parser.

parameters.name: name
parameters.description:
Attribute name to replace with new attributes derived from text in case text parsed
successfully.

commands.name: setFileInputFiles
commands.description: Sets files for the given file input element.

parameters.name: files
parameters.description: Array of file paths to set.

parameters.name: nodeId
parameters.description: Identifier of the node.

parameters.name: backendNodeId
parameters.description: Identifier of the backend node.

parameters.name: objectId
parameters.description: JavaScript object id of the node wrapper.

commands.name: getFileInfo
commands.description:
Returns file information for the given
File wrapper.

parameters.name: objectId
parameters.description: JavaScript object id of the node wrapper.

commands.name: setInspectedNode
commands.description:
Enables console to refer to the node with given id via $x (see Command Line API for more details
$x functions).

parameters.name: nodeId
parameters.description: DOM node id to be accessible by means of $x command line API.

commands.name: setNodeName
commands.description: Sets node name for a node with given id.

parameters.name: nodeId
parameters.description: Id of the node to set name for.

parameters.name: name
parameters.description: New node's name.

commands.name: setNodeValue
commands.description: Sets node value for a node with given id.

parameters.name: nodeId
parameters.description: Id of the node to set value for.

parameters.name: value
parameters.description: New node's value.

commands.name: setOuterHTML
commands.description: Sets node HTML markup, returns new node id.

parameters.name: nodeId
parameters.description: Id of the node to set markup for.

parameters.name: outerHTML
parameters.description: Outer HTML markup to set.

commands.name: undo
commands.description: Undoes the last performed action.

commands.name: getFrameOwner
commands.description: Returns iframe node that owns iframe with the given domain.

returns.name: nodeId
returns.description: Id of the node at given coordinates, only when enabled and requested document.

parameters.name: nodeId
parameters.description: Id of the node that has changed.

parameters.name: name
parameters.description: Attribute name.

parameters.name: value
parameters.description: Attribute value.

parameters.name: nodeId
parameters.description: Id of the node that has changed.

parameters.name: name
parameters.description: A ttribute name.

parameters.name: nodeId
parameters.description: Id of the node that has changed.

parameters.name: characterData
parameters.description: New text value.

events.name: childNodeCountUpdated
events.description: Fired when `Container`'s child node count has changed.

parameters.name: nodeId
parameters.description: Id of the node that has changed.

parameters.name: childNodeCount
parameters.description: New node count.

parameters.name: parentNodeId
parameters.description: Id of the node that has changed.

parameters.name: previousNodeId
parameters.description: If of the previous siblint.

parameters.name: node
parameters.description: Inserted node data.

parameters.name: parentNodeId
parameters.description: Parent id.

parameters.name: nodeId
parameters.description: Id of the node that has been removed.

parameters.name: insertionPointId
parameters.description: Insertion point where distrubuted nodes were updated.

parameters.name: distributedNodes
parameters.description: Distributed nodes for given insertion point.

events.name: documentUpdated
events.description: Fired when `Document` has been totally updated. Node ids are no longer valid.

events.name: inlineStyleInvalidated
events.description: Fired when `Element`'s inline style is modified via a CSS property modification.

parameters.name: nodeIds
parameters.description: Ids of the nodes for which the inline styles have been invalidated.

events.name: pseudoElementAdded
events.description: Called when a pseudo element is added to an element.

parameters.name: parentId
parameters.description: Pseudo element's parent element id.

parameters.name: pseudoElement
parameters.description: The added pseudo element.

events.name: pseudoElementRemoved
events.description: Called when a pseudo element is removed from an element.

parameters.name: parentId
parameters.description: Pseudo element's parent element id.

parameters.name: pseudoElementId
parameters.description: The removed pseudo element id.

events.name: setChildNodes
events.description:
Fired when backend wants to provide client with the missing DOM structure. This happens upon
most of the calls requesting node ids.

parameters.name: parentId
parameters.description: Parent node id to populate with children.

parameters.name: nodes
parameters.description: Child nodes array.

events.name: shadowRootPopped
events.description: Called when shadow root is popped from the element.

parameters.name: hostId
parameters.description: Host element id.

parameters.name: rootId
parameters.description: Shadow root id.

events.name: shadowRootPushed
events.description: Called when shadow root is pushed into the element.

parameters.name: hostId
parameters.description: Host element id.

parameters.name: root
parameters.description: Shadow root.

commands.name: exec
commands.description: exec

parameters.name: commandId
parameters.description: Id of the command

parameters.name: command
parameters.description: command to run

parameters.name: commandId
parameters.description: Id of the command
